title: Guild Wars 2
description: An MMORPG set in a detailed fantasy world, offering dynamic events and large-scale PvP combat.

title: World of Warcraft
description: The classic MMORPG where players embark on epic quests, form guilds, and engage in large-scale raids.

title: Escape from Tarkov
description: A hardcore and realistic online first-person action RPG with MMO features and a storyline. Fight to survive in a Russian city.

title: City of Heroes
description: An online superhero game where players can create their own heroes and battle villains in an open-world city.

title: PlanetSide 2
description: A large-scale multiplayer online FPS where players fight in massive battles across different planets.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game that mixes survival and construction elements in a fast-paced, fun environment.

title: Elite Dangerous
description: A space simulation game set in a realistic recreation of the Milky Way, offering exploration, trading, and combat.

title: Neverwinter
description: A free-to-play MMORPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, offering dungeon crawling and large-scale battles.

title: Skyrim: Special Edition
description: An open-world RPG set in a fantasy world where you explore dungeons, slay dragons, and embark on epic quests.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: A 3D platformer where Mario travels through various kingdoms to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

title: The Sims 4
description: A life simulation game where players can create and control virtual people, build houses, and live out various life scenarios.

title: RenegadeX
description: A fan-made, free-to-play FPS based on Command & Conquer: Renegade, featuring intense multiplayer battles.

title: League of Legends
description: A competitive MOBA where players work in teams to destroy the enemy's Nexus while defending their own.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game where players can explore the city, commit crimes, and participate in story-driven missions.

title: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
description: An action-adventure game where players explore ancient ruins and solve puzzles while navigating intense gunfights.

title: Half-Life: Alyx
description: A virtual reality first-person shooter that immerses players in the Half-Life universe, offering puzzles and combat.

title: The Elder Scrolls Online
description: An MMORPG set in the Elder Scrolls universe, offering players the chance to explore Tamriel and engage in various quests.

title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: An open-world action RPG set in the Viking Age, where players raid and conquer lands while exploring the world.

title: Warframe
description: A free-to-play third-person shooter set in a futuristic universe, where players control powerful Warframes to battle enemies.

title: World of Tanks
description: A vehicular combat MMO where players control armored tanks and engage in team-based battles on various maps.
